page.title: 03Hermitage Farm Wadborough 2.
page.content: This farm is an Arable Farm but it used to be a Dairy Farm. Mr Lole used to breed a lot of cows. Mr Lole also plants oil seed rape, he grows 25 hectares of it. Mr Lole has his wife to help him and his two sons and a student and a secretary, the secretary writes letters and works on some computers. He also keeps 200 sheep and 300 lambs.He keeps the wool and stores it in bags. He keeps some machinery to harvest the crops. So Mr Loles farm is very well looked after and they do very well with their crops.
